speaker: SYSTEM
text: Good afternoon! How may I help you today?

speaker: USER
text: I received the wrong item in my order. I ordered a blue sweater size M, but got a red one size L.

speaker: SYSTEM
text: I sincerely apologize for this error. I understand how frustrating that must be. Let me process a replacement for you right away with expedited shipping at no charge. I'll also arrange for a return label for the incorrect item.

speaker: USER
text: That would be great, thank you. How long will the replacement take?

speaker: SYSTEM
text: With expedited shipping, you should receive the correct blue sweater size M within 2-3 business days. I've also applied a 15% discount to your next order as an apology for the inconvenience.

speaker: USER
text: Wow, that's really thoughtful. I appreciate you taking care of this so quickly. The discount is a nice touch too.

speaker: SYSTEM
text: It's our pleasure to make this right. You'll receive the return label via email within the next hour, and tracking for your replacement shortly after. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

speaker: USER
text: No, that's everything. Thanks again for the excellent service!
